member.summary: Scrobble cache that writes scrobbles to local disk.

member.name: M:Hqub.Lastfm.Services.IAlbumService.SearchAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Search for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance.
member.param: The page number to fetch. Defaults to first page.
The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 30.
member.remarks:
This service does not require authentication.
https://www.last.fm/api/show/album.search

member.remarks:
This service does not require authentication.
https://www.last.fm/api/show/album.getInfo

This service does not require authentication.
https://www.last.fm/api/show/album.getTags

member.name: T:Hqub.Lastfm.Session
member.summary: Represents your identity tokens provided by Last.fm.
member.remarks:
A session with only API key and API secret is not authenticated and it wouldn't let you perform write operations on Last.fm. In order to have it authenticated you can call
client.AuthenticateAsync(username, password);

member.name: P:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.ApiKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the Last.fm API key.
member.remarks: To acquire one, please see https://www.last.fm/api/account/create

member.name: P:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.ApiSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the Last.fm API secret.
member.remarks: To acquire one, please see https://www.last.fm/api/account/create

member.name: P:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.SessionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the session secret.
member.remarks:
The Session key represents the user's permission to let you perform "write" operations on his/her profile.
To set this value, you have to use either one of the authentication methods of the class.

member.name: P:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.Authenticated
member.summary: Returns true if the session is authenticated.

member.name: M:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Hqub.Lastfm.Session.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
